subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In San Diego’s 23-17 overtime win over Indianapolis, Mike Scifres boomed six punts for a 51.7-yard net average, an N.F.L. record for a player with at least five punts.
snippet: In San Diego’s 23-17 overtime win over Indianapolis, Mike Scifres boomed six punts for a 51.7-yard net average, an N.F.L. record for a player with at least five punts.
